0: LONDON — A 31-year-old Romanian architect who plunged into the River Thames when a terrorist plowed a vehicle into pedestrians in London became the fifth victim to die as a result of the attack last month, the police said on Friday. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Image Andreea Cristea Credit London Metropolitan Police, via European Pressphoto Agency NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The story of the Romanian woman, Andreea Cristea, captured the hearts of Londoners — and many people around the world — after the March 22 attack on Parliament, which also wounded more than 50 people. the more captured architect plunged hearts world Thames to
